| name=The Balrogian Trilogy

| genre=[[Wikipedia:Text-Adventure|Text-Adventure]] series
|}}'''''The Balrogian Trilogy''''' is a series Text-Adventure video games that are parodies of ''[[The Hobbit]]'' and ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]''. It includes the following games:

#[[An Everyday Tale of a Seeker of Gold|''An Everyday Tale of a Seeker of Gold'']]
#[[Bulbo and the Lizard King|''Bulbo and the Lizard King'']]
#[[Fuddo and Slam|''Fuddo and Slam'']]

A later game in the series, [[Retarded Creatures and Caverns|''Retarded Creatures and Caverns'']], was not included in the trilogy.{{title|italics}}
